name: Cupcake: an Apartment Adventure
description:
A short but sweet game. You are a baker living in Sugarlake apartment complex. On a whim, you made some cupcakes and now the only question left is what to do with them?
Will you eat them?
Will you share them?
Will you throw them off the roof?
There are multiple endings to discover.

Explore the halls of Sugarlake apartment complex, meet your fellow tenants and decide the fate of these 6 delicious cupcakes.

Cupcake: an Apartment Adventure is a simple 2D game made with the RPG Maker MV program, use your 6 cupcakes on objects or the other tenants to unlock different endings. 20+ different endings to discover. This game features a colourful cast of non-playable characters and some silly endings.
